intro: Ardisia synneura, commonly known as the narrow-leaf evergreen ardisia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Myrsinaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Southeast Asia, including Malaysia and Indonesia. The plant is characterized by its glossy, dark green leaves and produces small, white to pale yellow flowers. Its fruit is a bright red berry that contains several seeds. Ardisia synneura is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and compact growth habit.
